title: Patch stuck at 0% AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: Really? This is still an issue that happens literally every single time the game updates?

replies.body:
Issues like these are usually specific to your setup.

Try running through the steps found here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

It could also be that you have a dodgy install if you haven't run a clean reinstall in a long time (or ever), so try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

Same happened to me today, 2018-09-27

I Fixed this bug by changing language to another. Patcher started to download new language, then I returned to the first lg and patcher were fixed.

Maybe this will help somone, so I will post this. GL on Rift.

Thanks dude that actually worked for me just now

After taking about 6 months off from the game, on the first new patch I have to install, it happens to me.  Tried every single one of the "fixes" I could find, and still nothing works. How this is still a problem is beyond me. Guess I'll just continue my break. Ridiculous.
7 months later still have this problem. Matter of fact there’s been patching issues since I started league in 2013. Don’t ypu think it’s about time they fixed that? I mean it’s 2018.

Check your net and run a clean reinstall with the Hextech repair tool. Consider the number of people that have never had this issue, it is more often than not specific to your setup and circumstances.

Issues like these are typically caused by local client instability (often caused by copied installs, patching errors that were never addressed etc.) or net instability (dcs during the patching process and the like).
So you recommend reinstalling with every goddamn patch that gets released? Funny that NO OTHER GAME I PLAY has issues like that.

First of all this post is from 8 months ago and hasn't been active in 2. Second, no. One bad patch often cascades into later patches, like a domino effect, one bad patch can affect you for many, but if you fix the problem in it's entirety, which a clean reinstall will do in most such circumstances, then it goes away forever.

Funny how I've literally never had a bad patch with League, but I have with Overwatch, does that mean Overwatch is shit and unstable? No, it means something happened with my net and/or PC while it was patching that caused issues.
Yall need to rework nunu guys. Please
